Perched on the red hill above Granada, this spectacular fortress was once the summer palace of Moorish royalty and offers a stunning blend of history, architecture, and breathtaking views. We also visit the serene Generalife Palace, once the sultans' summer retreat, and stroll through the enchanting Generalife Gardens.
